text: The Assembly of the Republic (Portuguese: Assembleia da República, ) is the parliament of Portugal. In the Constitution of Portugal, the unicameral parliament "is the representative assembly of all Portuguese citizens." The constitution names the assembly as one of the country's main authority. It is in a historical building in Lisbon, the Palácio de São Bento. ==Other websites== * Category:Government of Portugal Portugal Portugal
title: Assembly of the Republic (Portugal)
